meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Patrick Fernan Mindy Steinberg Renie Sotiropoulos Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4431.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Patrick Fernan, a government manager from Madison, Wisconsin
Mindy Steinberg, a public affairs program assistant from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Renie Sotiropoulos, a high school teacher from Crownsville, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,400)

tr.td: EAST ON THE MAP
SPORTS
BODY OF EVIDENCE
A BRITISH MONOPOLY SET
THE CABINET
PREFIXES YOU CAN COUNT ON

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Mindy: What is the Long Island Sound?)

the East River

MindyPatrick
')
